mapper.select: select MENU1.MENU_CODE, MENU1.MENU_TITLE, MENU1.MENU_URL, MENU1.MENU_LEVEL, MENU1.MENU_PARENT, MENU1.MENU_SEQ, MENU1.DEL_YN FROM menu menu1, menu menu2 WHERE menu1.MENU_PARENT = menu2.MENU_CODE AND menu1.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY menu1.`MENU_SEQ`
select MENU_CODE, MENU_TITLE, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_CHILD_YN, MENU_PARENT FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_SEQ
select MENU_CODE, MENU_TITLE, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_CHILD_YN, MENU_PARENT FROM MENU WHERE MENU_PARENT = #{value} ORDER BY MENU_SEQ
select MENU_CODE, MENU_SEQ, MENU_TITLE, MENU_URL, MENU_GNB, MENU_PARENT, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_CHILD_YN, MENU_GROUP, DEL_YN FROM MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = #{value}
